text: Bernardo Francisco da Silva, known as Chico Gordo (2 October 1949 – 22 November 2000) was an Angolan football player. He also held Portuguese citizenship. He played 11 seasons and 230 games in the Primeira Liga, mostly for Braga and also for Porto, Tirsense and Vitória de Setúbal. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Primeira Liga for Porto on 15 September 1968 in a 1–3 loss to Vitória de Setúbal. ==References== ==External links== Category:1949 births Category:People from Benguela Province Category:Portuguese people of Angolan descent Category:Angolan emigrants to Portugal Category:Angolan footballers Category:FC Porto players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:F.C.
